definitions.definition: the flat part of the body that a bird, insect, or bat uses for flying, or one of the flat, horizontal structures that stick out from the side of an aircraft and support it when it is flying:
examples: the delicacy of a butterfly's wings

definitions.definition: If a bird takes wing, it flies away.
to suddenly develop, freely and powerfully:
examples: She walked in the hills, letting her thoughts take wing.

definitions.definition: A bird that is on the wing is flying.
